hero.subheading: Royal family endorsed academic tutoring with 15+ years of proven success. Specialising in Oxbridge preparation, 11+ entry, GCSE & A-levels.

testimonials.heading: Trusted by Elite Families Across the UK

featured.quote: The exceptional tutoring support helped our child achieve their Cambridge offer. The personalised approach and expertise were invaluable.
Outstanding 11+ preparation that gave our daughter the confidence she needed. Professional, supportive, and highly effective.

aboutUs.heading: 15+ Years of Academic Excellence
aboutUs.description: My Private Tutor Online has been providing premium academic tutoring services to discerning families across the UK since 2010.

content.title: Royal Recognition
content.text: We are proud to have received testimonials from royal family members, reflecting our commitment to the highest standards of academic excellence and discretion.

content.title: Tatler Listed
content.text: Featured in the prestigious Tatler Address Book 2025, recognising our position among the UK's most trusted educational service providers.

content.title: Proven Track Record
content.text: With over 15 years of experience, we have helped hundreds of students achieve their academic goals, from 11+ success to Oxbridge acceptance.

founder.name: Beth
founder.title: Founder & Director
founder.bio: With a passion for academic excellence and deep understanding of the UK education system, Beth has built My Private Tutor Online into one of the country's most respected tutoring services.
